title: FREE COACHING (GOLD AND UNDER)
body:
Hello guys! 

I'm a high gold player, who peaked around platinum 3 
And I'm looking to get into coaching. I aim to raise any person up, through not just any game knowledge I have, but also a bit of personal development, whilst learning from what I teach too. 

I'm thinking I can, answer any questions you have, explain things, psycgology, in-game etc.

I'm also thinking of doing VOD reviews.

If you're interested, please dont hesitate to add me in game under 'Jixie xue' 

Thanks for your time, and see you all on the rift!

replies.body: I am interested please message me in game
